title: Wait why did you buff tryndamere????
body: Trynds been getting so much hate(rightfully so) on the boards as of late because he is completely cancerous and so strong right now with his ability to abuse conqueror and has highest jg winrate and decent top winrate. So you buff his e without a single nerf to the rest of his kit? Riot???

replies.body:
His core items got more expensive and rageblade got nerfed, also without old ER he lost cdr.

Also where does he have the highest jg winrate? And his top wr is at 47%... He was literally the worst toplaner before this patch.

His core items actually got cheaper unless you think {{item:3087}} is his core. 

{{item:3153}} dropped 200g.
{{item:3026}} stayed the same.
{{item:3031}} went down 100g.
{{item:3046}} went up 300g.

Aka..... price is about the friggin same.

He is not the worst top. He just is a frequent play and has a lot of bad teams. It's not his performance doing bad.

He also always succeeds in solo taking 5-6 turrets. He never has lane problems. His KDA is reasonable. His damage output is high.

Also, you're quoting the wrong win rate:

https://lolalytics.com/ranked/worldwide/platinum/plus/champion/Tryndamere/ 50.9%

They are taking 2 seconds off his highest damage skill, AND his mobility skill. He literally can chase someone forever now. There is no double wall jumps anymore.

This means he can Spin> Slow a runner, AA, AA, AA.....Spin > Slow runner.

With this change he's going to be a Nasus strength hitter who isn't impeded by walls.

{{item:3153}}  Is mostly played in Korea.
{{item:3026}} Dont know since when this is a core tryn item.
Also old {{item:3031}} costed 200 less than it does now, even tho most people did build {{item:3508}} for the 30%cdr.
{{item:3046}} Yes 300 Gold.

Aka. price went up by 500 and the building path is worse because of 2 B.F. swords.

Just alot of bad team? That would mean that that is a thing specific for tryn...

There is no such thing as "always" in league.

Win rate vrie from source to source thats true, but i also like to look at the overall winrate with bronze, silver and gold included. Especially since most people who complain about tryn are bronze and silver.

Tryn lost 30%cdr because of the essence reaver change and with the new nerf to rageblade he also looses alot of dmg.

I think that a buff for tryn was definetly a reasonable thing, maybe the E wasnÂ´t the right choice but still a reasonable one.
